bibl.bibl: Heer, Oswald. 1876. Beiträge zur Jura-Flora Ostsibiriens und des Amurlandes. [Read 23 March 1876.] Mémoires de l’Académie impériale des sciences de St.-Pétersbourg 7th ser. 22: 1–122. [Heer 1868–83 (Flora fossilis arctica), vol. 4.]
bibl.idno: WBB4 Q340:9.a.1. Articles independently paginated, Heer’s is 12th and last in vol.
